column1: '''Bucca of the Marish''' was the first thain of the [[Hobbits]] in [[Eriador]].

column2: 379}}, some four years after the fall of the [[Arnor
column3: North-kingdom]], the Hobbits of [[the Shire]] elected from their midst one Bucca of the [[Marish]] as the first [[Thain]]. He was to rule the land in the [[King of Arthedain
column4: King]]'s stead. Little else is known about him, other than that he brought peace and prosperity to the Hobbits.<ref>{{App

column1: His family became the [[Oldbucks]] and eventually the [[Brandybuck Family
The word '''Bucca''' is [[Old English]] for "buck", "male deer" or "he-goat" which is a translation of the original [[Westron]] name '''[[Gamba]]'''.<ref>{{HM
